channel.title: Keep dcing with other clients
channel.description:
Hey,
I have been using a base to work of for a long time now, and im now comming up to finishing my server and want to move on and imporve the client or even change client, but everytime i log in with another client i get dced. I think it may be because the client is calling something in the server files, and if the client doesnt have it, it cant log in.
Please help
Ty for reading

item.title: Keep dcing with other clients
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

Hey,

I have been using a base to work of for a long time now, and im now comming up to finishing my server and want to move on and imporve the client or even change client, but everytime i log in with another client i get dced. I think it may be because the client is calling something in the server files, and if the client doesnt have it, it cant log in.

Please help

Ty for reading
